.. MyJobSpyAI documentation master file

Welcome to MyJobSpyAI Documentation
==================================

MyJobSpyAI is a powerful AI-powered job search and analysis tool that helps job seekers optimize their applications and helps recruiters analyze candidate qualifications.

.. raw:: html

   <div class="admonition note">
   <p class="admonition-title">New in v1.0.0</p>
   <p>Check out the <a href="changelog.html">changelog</a> for details about the latest release!</p>
   </div>
